item.title: Prospect add a quote by Fred Rogers
item.description: "You rarely have time for everything you want in this life, so you need to make choices. And hopefully your choices can come from a deep sense of who you are. " -- Fred Rogers

item.title: Prospect add a quote by Neil deGrasse Tyson
